qa_list.question: What are the names of the days listed in the text?
qa_list.answer: The text lists the following days: Monday, Tuesday, Wednesday, Thursday, Friday, Saturday

qa_list.question: What are the names of the times listed in the text?
qa_list.answer: The text lists the following times: 5:00 PM, 6:20 PM, 10:30 PM, 11:00 AM, 1:00 PM, 3:00 PM

qa_list.question: What are the names of the locations listed in the text?
qa_list.answer: The text lists the following locations: Pittsburgh, Pennsylvania

qa_list.question: What is the name of the event listed at the end of the text?
qa_list.answer: The name of the event listed at the end of the text is 'Lonely Planet: VAR Directing'
